definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]

sentences.english: Experience is a gift being given.
sentences.chinese: 履历是一份礼品，我们正在被付与着。

sentences.english: I am enclosing my resume together with my photo, and I believe that they may be found satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 兹随函附履历表及照片一份，希望阁下能够满意。

sentences.english: Describe a time when a problem wast resolved to your satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 描写你对于疑难题目的措置惩罚不称心的一次履历。

sentences.english: Or perhaps an employer is looking at your resume and waffling about whether you deserve to be interviewed or not.
sentences.chinese: 也有可能雇主正在看你的履历并且犹豫是否该面试你。

sentences.english: Lessons must remain learned from the past wars.
sentences.chinese: 必需从过往的战争中罗致履历哺育。

sentences.english: I fundamentally disagree and I am proud of her record.
sentences.chinese: 我从根本上不同意这个前提，我为她的履历自豪。

sentences.english: Within these materials, several pieces provide us historical materials to rearrangement Wang Shu's individual resume.
sentences.chinese: 其中，有多篇奏章能为我们提供整理王恕履历的史料。

sentences.english: David Edmondson resigned following questions about his resume's accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 大卫艾蒙森不愿就其履历表准确性的问题作任何回应。

sentences.english: Your past has already been reflected on your C. V . of course.
sentences.chinese: 你的过去当然都在履历上已有反映。

sentences.english: Therefore, Wu Wer's life and love journey is worth our speculating.
sentences.chinese: 由此，吴为的人生跋涉与情感履历值得我们深思。

sentences.english: The unitive interface to import all Assembly Resume Forms' information was provided.
sentences.chinese: 同时提供了录入各种装配履历信息的统一界面。

sentences.english: Feel like the absence of a bachelor's degree on your resume is forcing you to settle for a second-rate job?
sentences.chinese: 感到履历里没有学士学位迫使你满足于一份二流工作？

sentences.english: Eventually my thought went back to the old days of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 终于乱七八糟地去想这山的远年履历。

sentences.english: The meaning of a broad friendship is luciferous side of a people all record.
sentences.chinese: 宽泛意义的友情是一个人全部履历的光明面。

sentences.english: Now it’s just a résumé item.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在，这只是履历表中的一个栏目。

sentences.english: A: Well, I’ve looked over your resume, Mr. Peepers.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我看过了你的履历表，皮伯斯先生。

definition: to hold an office or post
to be born of/to come from/family background/class origin
to take up a post/to start in a new job
(of one person) to hold the successive posts of/(of several persons) the successive (presidents etc)
